par.problem: Large-scale organizations struggling with inefficient legacy systems and undefined business processes.

par.problem: Clients possessed vast amounts of data but lacked actionable insights due to poor reporting infrastructure.
par.action: Designed and deployed interactive Power BI dashboards, utilizing advanced DAX formulas to calculate custom KPIs.
par.result: Enabled data-driven decision-making, reducing reporting time by 40% and identifying key revenue drivers.
